title: Apigee - Get support
abstract:
# Apigee - Get support
**    Preview    — Apigee API hub ** This feature is subject to the "Pre-GA Offerings Terms" in the General Service Terms section   of the [Service Specific Terms](/terms/service-terms#1) .     Pre-GA features are available "as is" and might have limited support.    For more information, see the [launch stage descriptions](/products#product-launch-stages) .
This document describes how to get support for API hub during the preview release. Select from the following options:
- [Google Cloud community](#community) 
- [Google Cloud console feedback](#feedback)
content:
## Cloud community support
Have questions about Apigee API hub? Get answers and support from a global network of experts in the [ Apigee community](https://www.googlecloudcommunity.com/gc/Apigee/bd-p/cloud-apigee) . Use the label `API Hub` .
## Send feedback
To send feedbak from the console:
- From the Google Cloud console, click help_outline **Support** .
- Click **Send feedback** .
- Follow the instructions in the **Send feedback** dialog.
- Click **Send** .
